Package com.nandox.jop.core.sevices

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServiceJSManager
    Interface for all services javascript manager.
    Every service javascript is loaded from init ServiceJSServlet and have an identifier equal to base path service
    (es: inject) that is used to identify and execute the manager.
    To implement a new service create a class that implements this interface and into getIdentifier method return the identifier.
    es for inject service:

      public Class inject implements ServiceJSManager {
       public String getIdentifier() {
        return "inject";
       }
       ...
      }

    service is called by url /jopservices/inject
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractServiceJS
    Abstract general javascript service.
    Inject
    Implementation of inject service manager.
    ServiceJSDataBlock
    Represent JAXB schema of response Data block
    ServiceJSDataBlock.Block
    Java class for anonymous complex type.
    ServiceJSResponse
    Javascript Service response.
    The response can be different format: xml, json.
    ServiceJSServlet
    Servlet for JavaScript services and file script.
    The script file are downloaded from path jopscript/*.
    The services are implemented to exchange XML fragment, command and response

    Possible Service:

    /inject to base inject operation
    Services command:
    postBlock: { Jop.id:'jop id', ....
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServiceJSResponse.Format
    Response format
